## EventRouter.listenerCount() method

Get the number of listeners for a specific event type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
listenerCount(eventType: keyof EventPayloadMap): number;
```

</th><th>

Description

The type of event to get the listener count for.


</td></tr>

**Returns:**
